subject: Re: Observation
author: rosemary_guiley
full_text:
Hi Jeremy,

I think that working in/researching the paranormal affects a person's
overall psychic/intuitive sense.  The more you do it, the deeper you
go, the more developed you get in general.

Rosemary
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "ecuyler" <ecuyler@...> wrote:
>
> I have a question for those of you who have been doing this research
> for a while.  Since doing the research, have you noticed an increase
> in your "intuitive" senses?  By that I mean, has your hearing been
> heightened to the point of hearing conversations when you are alone? 
> Or seeing things more clearly spirit wise?  Or am I just nuts and need
> to be committed?  
> 
> I had to ask.  It's a very strange thing.  These things have been
> happening to me and I'm wondering if you have experienced the same
> thing or close to it.
> 
> Jeremy
>
